description: Analyzes a process by tracking a process property (i.e. an orderid) over multiple process stages. It automatically creates a process model and serves as input component for the Process Visualizer dashboard component.

properties.name: processname
properties.label: Process Name
properties.description: Specify the name of the process.

properties.name: processproperty
properties.label: Process Property
properties.description: Specify the name of the property that identifies the business object, i.e. orderid.

properties.name: stageproperty
properties.label: Stage Property
properties.description: Specify the name of the property which contains the name of the stage to which an input message will be assigned.

properties.name: processstartstages
properties.label: Process Start Stages
properties.description: Specify substrings of stage names that mark the start of a process. Only those processes are respected that start with a stage that contains one of these substrings. Add these to ensure to have only complete processes in the model.

properties.name: processendstages
properties.label: Process End Stages
properties.description: Specify substrings of stage names that mark the end of the process. A process that contains one of these substrings in the stage name is automatically moved to Process End.

properties.name: kpis
properties.label: Key Performance Indicators (KPI)
properties.description: Provide the KPI properties contained in the input messages. These properties must have a numeric value.

tablefields.name: label
tablefields.label: Label
tablefields.description: Provide the label for this KPI.

properties.name: alerts
properties.label: Alerting
properties.description: Provide the maximum time for a process to stay at a specific stage. An alert is fired when this time is exceeded.

tablefields.name: thresholdvalue
tablefields.label: Threshold Value
tablefields.description: Provide the value of the time threshold for this stage.

tablefields.name: thresholdunit
tablefields.label: Threshold Unit
tablefields.description: Provide the unit of the time threshold for this stage.

properties.name: stageexpirationvalue
properties.label: Stage Expiration Value
properties.description: A process will expire after this time at a stage and is being moved via Process Expired to Process End. 0 means no expiration

properties.name: historydays
properties.label: Keep Model History for Days
properties.description: Saves a process model history for the number of days in 15 minute snapshots.

properties.name: updateintervalsec
properties.label: Update Interval Seconds
properties.description: Interval in seconds in which the updates are sent to the dashboard component.
